thread.title: Marge Chaires
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Marge Chaires

author: Marge Chaires
title: Marge Chaires
text: Ever since I bought my initial canister and then added another asking for help, questions, you folks claim #1 spot in all industries to me. I have been is outside sales oillfield for 30 yrs and no one does things the way I choose to perform. You folks do ! You fill all my needs to clear the worst water I hear in Texas from my Utility. NO salt, to haul (single) no electricity and no backwashing, with flter being a snap to change Thank you and continue your good phone ettiquete.
